data.title: 过程追踪-定
data.code:

            var date2 = params[1].data;
            var date3 = params[0].data;

            date2 = (date2.getMonth() + 1) + "-" + date2.getDate();
            date3 = (date3.getMonth() + 1) + "-" + date3.getDate();
            res += params[3].seriesName + "~" + params[2].seriesName + ":</br>" + date0 + "~" + date1 + "</br>"
